text: Experience unique. Bonne bouffe. Bon service.  Vivez l'ambiance d'un restaurant de la tradition Vodka

Order from the table d'hôte of that night. For starters I ventured into this restaurant on a cold winter night.  I began with a hot bowl of this fantastic borsch.  Packed with flavour fresh cilantro and fresh spices that when combined with the heat of the soup created that perfect comfort food for a cold winters day.  As a main meal i had a Hungarian goulash, what can I say, it was simply prepared in a clay pot with fresh vegetables and potatoes.  The meat melted in your mouth assisted the beautifully assorted flavours complimenting the entire dish.  Didn't take desert that night was feeling it, so the night was ended with a nice cup of coffee.  Would definitely visit this establishment again as the staff are very friendly and warm, and if you enjoy live music, Friday and Saturday its the place to be.

Super Ambiance!!! Pour commencer ce resto n'est pas un simple resto c'est toute une expérience!  J'ai été invité au mariage de mon amie Moldave je ne suis jamais aller à un restaurant russe et j'ai été agréablement surprise.  Conseil si vous êtes quelqu'un qui aime les place paisible Rasputin n'est pas pour vous. La nourriture y est en abondance il on l'habitude de gros groupe est il a un repas de 5 services. C'est l'équivalent d'un buffet il y a du poisson du caviar des crêpe de la salade du porc du poulet le tout apprêté a la Russe le dessert si vs vous rendez jusque la est exquis. En soirée il y a un chanteur qui met l'ambiance pour le reste de la nuit avec une piste de danse! Tout le monde danse sur des chansons russes et quelques hits plus connus. Je sais qu'il y a la possibilité d'avoir un menu à la carte également . Vraiment une belle soirée.

Hello I went there one time during lunch hour during the week. The resto was almost empty. Service was so slow no one comes to see me. I ask for menu and I wait. I decide finally to go else were. Difficult to put a note I dint ha very the chance to eat.

Had super high hopes after some of the reviews online stating "slow but delicious". I understand what they mean when they say inattentive service, went for lunch and we were one of TWO hole tables (us a party of 2 and them a party of 4), soup of the day was bland, food was slow, and although our proteins/main portion of the main dish were very tasty, the sides were awful. No salt or pepper could even be detected on the potatoes, and that salad's only dressing was low grade olive oil. I had the pork chop and he had one of the mushroom dishes (cream and pork I think?) but it's not worth the time or money for that quality on the rest of the meal
J'ai vraiment aimé ce restaurant pour sa cuisine authentique et les prix honnêtes (particulièrement sur l'heure du midi). La salle à manger y est aussi très confortable.
